trigger_event: Massive whistleblower leaks expose deep BCI abuses and throw the city into turmoil. Amid this storm, Halden’s sealed residence is unsealed, revealing a vault containing his final confession video and override protocols.
dilemma: With the city on the brink, should Sven Halek release Halden's heartbroken video confession to the public, fueling a reckoning but risking chaos? Or arm Directorate-loyal councils with override tools to secretly sabotage rivals and forcefully restore order? Both options cannot coexist; Sven must pick one path and bear its consequences.
reason: The stakes are painfully high: one choice offers catharsis and justice but risks losing all control, while the other guarantees authority through manipulation, yet deepens wounds and divides. Sven is torn, haunted by his loyalty to order and the raw humanity echoed in Alex's words.
choice_a: Release Halden’s confessional video, exposing the BCI’s harms and driving the city toward public reckoning and possible abolition of the system.
belief_a: Only the full truth can unite a fractured city.
Public confession is necessary for real justice and healing.
Manipulation cannot restore legitimacy—only transparency can.
choice_b: Distribute spiral override sabotage protocols to loyal councils, sparking targeted chaos to undermine rivals and pressure Stenograd back under Directorate control.
belief_b: Order must be preserved, even through harsh means.
Transparency now would only unleash uncontrollable chaos.
Strength and discipline are the only safeguards against collapse.
